title: Mirai Keisatsu Urashiman (Future Police Urashiman)
synopsis: By chance, Ryo has slipped from the 1980s into the future, and is trying to get back. In the interim, he's working for the police force of the future, solving cases by applying his unique and often comical approach.
voices: ['Kamiya, Akira', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Kobayashi, Michitaka', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Kitahama, Haruko']
staff: [['Ishiyama, Takaaki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kogawa, Yoriyasu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tomita, Sukehiro', ['Script']], ['Terada, Kenji', ['Script']]]
